room_title: Escape room "Classified" by The Escape Game Austin in Austin
review: I went here with my wife for a date night and was not disappointed. We did the Classified room and even though we were alone and didn't have any other help we had so much fun, unfortunately we didn't make it out in time, we had 1 more clue to go, but I would still highly recommend it.The staff were so friendly and helpful and overall the experience was fantastic.The location is downtown however you can park at the convention center and it only cost us $5, the place itself is right next to the convention center.Bottom line: if you love puzzles, games and challenges, but also love having a good fun time then this is the place for you!

room_title: Escape room "Classified" by The Escape Game Austin in Austin
review: We've done quite a few escape rooms in different cities and The Classified room was so fun! Challenging but doable, not too easy at all. Such a great time! We don't live in Austin but will be back to try the other three rooms for sure.

room_title: Escape room "Classified" by The Escape Game Austin in Austin
review: Had a great time Friday night in The Classified room. Hope was our guide and she was AWESOME! Will definitely go back for other challenges! Great for any group.

room_title: Escape room "Classified" by The Escape Game Austin in Austin
review: Of all the escape rooms I've done, this is as easily the most impressive and immersive one yet. Can't wait to do their other three games, and the staff is very friendly but thankfully quite hands off when you are playing. Highly recommended if you like puzzles and want a very memorable and engaging experiences with friends, family, or co-workers.

room_title: Escape room "Classified" by The Escape Game Austin in Austin
review: I've been to many escape rooms, Pittsburgh, Nashville, New York, and Austin, and these guys are at the top of the list. Great attention to detail and the rooms have the perfect blend of challenge, skill, and fun. I would definitely recommend if you have small group and an hour to kill.
